readable.title: 2595713720_30534e8de2
readable.content: A girl in a cowboy hat with a sheep on a leash . a girl wearing a pink hat is walking beside a sheep on a dusty path . A little girl in a pink cowgirl hat and blue cast over her arm , is walking a sheep . A young girl wearing a pink cowboy hat holding a sheep on a leash . The girl is wearing a pink cowgirl hat and pink boots .
